realtimeweb.businesssearch.regular

Class DealOption

  • Object
    • realtimeweb.businesssearch.regular.DealOption

  • public class DealOption
extends Object
    A DealOption is an item in a Deal.
    Author:
    acbart

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DealOption(HashMap<String,Object> raw) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getOriginalPrice()
      Returns the original price of this option, before the deal is applied, in cents.
      String getOriginalPriceFormatted()
      Returns the original price of this option, before the deal is applied, as a nicely formatted string.
      int getPrice()
      Returns the price offered by this deal, in cents.
      String getPriceFormatted()
      Returns the price offered by this deal as a nicely formatted string.
      String getPurchaseUrl()
      Returns the URL for this purchase option.
      int getRemainingCount()
      Returns the remaining deal options available for purchase, if this deal is limited.
      String getTitle()
      Returns the title of this option.
      boolean isQuantityLimited()
      Returns whether the quantity of this deal is limited.

      • Methods inherited from class Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • getRemainingCount

        public int getRemainingCount()
        Returns the remaining deal options available for purchase, if this deal is limited. If it is not limited, -1 is returned.
        Returns:
        the remainingCount
